fields.Title: PIER / JOYCE LYNCHING AND TATTOOS
fields.Description:
The lynching hub
The tattoos hub

fields.Title: You: ""Probably.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Probably."

fields.Title: You: ""You liked him.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You liked him."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Feels like there's a good response..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Feels like there's a good response here, but you're not coming up with one. Carry on.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""My only hope is that yours provide..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My only hope is that yours provides a single, concrete suspect -- before they indiscriminately pick theirs. Simply put..." She grabs hold of the mainsail:
fields.Alternate1: "My only hope is that yours provides a single, concrete suspect -- before they indiscriminately pick theirs. Simply put..." She leans against the wooden planks:

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Have you ever seen a hornet invade..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Have you ever seen a hornet invade a beehive, lieutenant?" She leans back. "It's not pretty."
fields.Alternate1: "Have you ever seen a hornet invade a beehive, detective?" She leans back. "It's not pretty."

fields.Title: You: ""Maybe the investigations can team..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe the investigations can team up? You know, share resources and intelligence."

fields.Title: Empathy: "She has no excess of emotions for t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She has no excess of emotions for this cadaver. Has she seen dead bodies before? It's likely.

fields.Title: You: "Nowhere. There is no soul."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nowhere. There is no soul.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I'm not trying to reassure you, of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not trying to reassure you, officer. Quite the opposite, in fact." There is a brief silence. Seagulls squawk over the bay...

fields.Title: Logic: "One is obviously the *Scab Leader*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: One is obviously the *Scab Leader* -- at the harbour gates. The one chanting the idiotic slogans. He's barely maintaining his disguise.

fields.Title: You: ""What? *Going native*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What? *Going native*?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""One is a man, *Korty* they call hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "One is a man, *Korty* they call him. A nickname as well. The other a woman, Phillis de Paule. Korty is... *the gunner,* I believe. De Paule is a radio operator."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""He was forty. Or fifty. It's hard..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He was forty. Or fifty. It's hard to say which, he had a combat injury on his lower jaw. It made it difficult to estimate his age, or gauge his facial expressions."

fields.Title: You: ""I know the woman you're talking ab..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I know the woman you're talking about. We have it under control."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "The situation at the gates is a pow..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The situation at the gates is a powder keg. She says she wants to avert catastrophe but that's where she draws the line? I call bullshit.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She sips from her thermos."
fields.Dialogue Text: She sips from her thermos.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The story is, one of them, the col..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The story is, one of them, the colonel -- I don't know his real name -- sexually assaulted a local woman. While he was drunk and separated from his unit. This allowed some of the more militant Union members to subdue him."

fields.Title: You: ""What can they do against the Union..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What can they do against the Union? There seem to be a lot of them."

fields.Title: You: ""Wash it nice and clean...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wash it nice and clean..."

fields.Title: Shivers: "Houses drenched in red, blood gushi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Houses drenched in red, blood gushing down Rue Saint-Cispare... the whole place mopped with a giant red rag! Fresh bullet holes for all the old buildings...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""All we can do is keep the rest fro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "All we can do is keep the rest from going the same way. One single, concrete suspect delivered into Civil Court -- and I *may* be able to defuse this situation."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""One single, concrete suspect deliv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "One single, concrete suspect delivered into Civil Court -- a good one -- and I *may* be able to defuse this situation."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It is very far from *disco*." A wa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It is very far from *disco*." A wave crashes against the side of her boat. "My only hope is that you provide a single, concrete suspect before the mercenaries indiscriminately pick theirs. Simply put..." She grabs hold of the mainsail:
fields.Alternate1: "It is very far from *disco*." A wave crashes against the side of her boat. "My only hope is that you provide a single, concrete suspect before the mercenaries indiscriminately pick theirs. Simply put..." She leans against the wooden planks:

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""You're likely to run into them eve..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're likely to run into them eventually. When that happens, I'll be in a better position to mediate if I don't appear *involved*."

fields.Title: You: "Stay quiet. Observe the woman's exp..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Stay quiet. Observe the woman's expression.

fields.Title: Logic: "No idea. Maybe she's right -- it's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No idea. Maybe she's right -- it's a better idea not to confront them? Also, there's something wrong with your brain. This was so easy, how could you fail it?

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""That *would* afford a good vantage..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That *would* afford a good vantage point." She nods, poised and unperturbed. "*Still* -- I hope you heed my advice. There's no need to kick the hornet's nest."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I hope I can answer it better.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I hope I can answer it better."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm gonna say no.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm gonna say no."

fields.Title: You: ""This Lely -- anything else? Nation..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This Lely -- anything else? Nationality? How old would you say he was?"

fields.Title: Logic: "The lieutenant was testing her -- a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant was testing her -- asking a small detail first to see if she knew him better than she let on. She passed.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This does not come as news to us,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This does not come as news to us, but still..." He exchanges a glance with you. "To *your* knowledge, where did this assault take place? If you know."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes. I'm afraid this strike may de..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. I'm afraid this strike may descend into a small scale civil war. With possible consequences for all of Revachol West."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""That is exactly what it means. Wha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That is exactly what it means. What I am about to tell you is more pressing, I assure you."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*Every worker*...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Every worker*..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She remains unfazed. "That is preci..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She remains unfazed. "That is precisely what the sailors feared when they drew these maps. A fear of drowning -- within one's own corpse."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What next?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What next?"

fields.Title: You: ""This man is no brother of mine, bu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This man is no brother of mine, but this is his service history."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The International Collaboration Pol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The International Collaboration Police (ICP) is charged with coordinating law enforcement activities in complex, multi-national investigations. Their database is the single largest source of information in the world.

fields.Title: Logic: "The other has a vantage point in a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The other has a vantage point in a building South of the roundabout -- they were keeping tabs on you while you were canvassing the lorry drivers.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""For all your talk of averting this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "For all your talk of averting this catastrophe, the situation at the gates is a powder keg. Does this not bother you?"

fields.Title: You: ""One is probably in a building over..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "One is probably in a building overlooking the roundabout."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Surely there are other people to as..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Surely there are other people to ask about the tattoo. This is not necessary to complete the task, officer -- it's a dangerous side-task. Search elsewhere.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I can't remember." There's a pang..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can't remember." There's a pang of regret to her voice.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And that seems to corroborate the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And that seems to corroborate the ethnicity we gave." The lieutenant is pedantically happy about it.

fields.Title: You: ""That's enough for now." (Conclude...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's enough for now." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Suggestion: "It only lasts for the briefest inst..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It only lasts for the briefest instance but you catch a look of disappointment in her eye. Anger even.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Surely you're joking. These people..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Surely you're joking. These people are killers. My only hope is that yours provides a single, concrete suspect -- before they indiscriminately pick theirs. Simply put..." She grabs hold of the mainsail:
fields.Alternate1: "They won't. My only hope is that yours provides a single, concrete suspect -- before they indiscriminately pick theirs. Simply put..." She leans against the wooden planks:

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Too many things have *already* gon..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Too many things have *already* gone wrong." She looks to you, eyes damp from the wind.
fields.Alternate1: "Too many things have *already* gone wrong." She looks at you, eyes damp from the wind. "Lieutenant Double-Yefreitor Du Bois..."
fields.Alternate2: "Too many things have *already* gone wrong." She looks to you, eyes damp from the wind. "Nameless, badge-less detective of the Citizens Militia..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""They don't have the same respect f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They don't have the same respect for the Revachol Citizens Militia as I do. To put it bluntly they think you're vigilantes, *ghetto savages*. It will not be a fruitful meeting."

fields.Title: You: ""One must be the goon in ill-fittin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "One must be the goon in ill-fitting work clothes by the harbour gates. The scab leader."
fields.Alternate1: "I'm thinking the company put one leading strikebreakers at the gates. What do *you* think?"

fields.Title: You: ""Sounds like maybe the colonel went..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sounds like maybe the colonel went a little *native* during the course of his duties."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes. All the good conflict corrido..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. All the good conflict corridors: Supramundi, Yeesut, the Semenese islands. Countries that don't have a good record reporting *atrocious* military conduct on their soil."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""If you mean did I see him alive --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you mean did I see him alive -- yes. But I did not *know* him."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant cuts in: "What would..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant cuts in: "What would you say was his eye colour -- the deceased's?"

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Down a deep, black well."
fields.Dialogue Text: Down a deep, black well.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Good for you." She looks at the co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good for you." She looks at the coastline, then at you. "Now back to the impending blood bath."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Since you're sharing, ma'am -- thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Since you're sharing, ma'am -- this is also the RCM's worst case scenario."

fields.Title: You: ""Too many investigations in Martina..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Too many investigations in Martinaise."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It appears you've found it, yes. A..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It appears you've found it, yes. And I'm not happy for you."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "An empire without an emperor."
fields.Dialogue Text: An empire without an emperor.

fields.Title: You: ""Then what?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then what?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""They boast a long list of clients:..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They boast a long list of clients: Saint-Batiste, Welchman-Lorentz, Eendracht... A warning sign, however -- the operations concerned all take place in third- or fourth-world countries. Guarding facilities, escort missions, and such."

fields.Title: You: ""It sounds like you object to the w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It sounds like you object to the words 'going native' more than him raping and killing people here."

fields.Title: You: ""It's the first time I've heard of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's the first time I've heard of this. Where did this assault take place? And when?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""*Liked* is a bit strong," she toss..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Liked* is a bit strong," she tosses her head. "He... he was the most charismatic among them. He handled all the talking. His departure left a major gap in the group's *communication skills*."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Lely. His service name, a nom de g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lely. His service name, a nom de guerre most likely. He wouldn't divulge his full name. Only one of them did -- a bad sign if there ever was one."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I can't. This man was no sailor --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can't. This man was no sailor -- and these are no ports. I can understand geographic fragments, but not their meaning."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""He was taken out behind the Whirli..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He was taken out behind the Whirling-in-Rags and lynched. Last Sunday night."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""If you don't pin this on someone *..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you don't pin this on someone *good* -- and do it *fast* -- they will identify and execute everyone present at the lynching. This, in turn, will force the Union to respond."

fields.Title: You: ""The numbers are against them -- a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The numbers are against them -- a thousand to one."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""These men work in tandem using sem..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "These men work in tandem using semi-and fully automatic firearms. Their armour is virtually impenetrable to muzzle-loaded weapons -- even *yours*. Most Union workers don't have guns at all..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""*Many* bleak scenarios have alread..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Many* bleak scenarios have already come to pass to lead us here..." She looks at you, eyes damp from the wind.
fields.Alternate1: "*Many* bleak scenarios have already come true." She looks at you, eyes damp from the wind. "Lieutenant Double-Yefreitor Du Bois..."
fields.Alternate2: "*Many* bleak scenarios have already come true." She looks at you, eyes damp from the wind. "Nameless, badge-less detective of the Citizens Militia..."

fields.Title: You: ""What can you tell me about Krenel?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What can you tell me about Krenel?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Do you know a lot about the inner..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you know a lot about the inner workings of the RCM and the ICP, ma'am?"

fields.Title: You: ""They just need someone to put the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They just need someone to put the *Fear of Revachol* into their hearts."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""That is a *bad* idea, one I won't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That is a *bad* idea, one I won't be a party to." She shakes her head emphatically.

fields.Title: You: ""What do you think?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you think?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Quite a few. Vredefort -- the Oran..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Quite a few. Vredefort -- the Oranjese capital -- traditionally stands on the right shoulder." She points to it on the photo. "He started somewhere near here, I think."

fields.Title: You: ""Places? Like stars in the sky?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Places? Like stars in the sky?"
fields.Alternate1: "Like stars in the sky?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I can't. This man was no sailor --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can't. This man was no sailor -- and these are no ports. I can understand geographic fragments, but not their meaning."

fields.Title: You: ""What is that?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is that?"

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "For all the boys looking for advent..."
fields.Dialogue Text: For all the boys looking for adventure -- a blood spatter on the seas.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She hands you back the photo. "Is t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She hands you back the photo. "Is there anything else I can help you with?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Where is your radio, for contactin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where is your radio, for contacting them -- if I may ask? Do you have an ear piece?"

fields.Title: You: ""This is where you draw the line --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is where you draw the line -- *going native*? Not at hiring a paramilitary death squad?"

fields.Title: You: ""Boy oh boy, is that not good...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Boy oh boy, is that not good..."

fields.Title: You: ""Damn right.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Damn right."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""*...a member of the board*," she n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*...a member of the board*," she nods. "I tried to convince my employer it was simply a piece of rhetoric -- or a joke. They did not appreciate the humour."
fields.Alternate1: "*...a member of the board*," she nods. "I tried to convince my employer it was simply an opening gambit, like you suggested -- or a joke even. They did not appreciate the humour."

fields.Title: You: ""*Every worker*...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Every worker*..."

fields.Title: Half Light: "You should show those meatheads exa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You should show those meatheads exactly how *savage* you really are.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Sorry," she breaks her concentrati..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sorry," she breaks her concentration. "I was trying to see if I can read the web of interdependencies between these points -- the stars." She points to one on the photo paper.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Somewhere in an office lit by a sin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Somewhere in an office lit by a single green desk lamp captain Ptolemaios Pryce -- 58, bald and bespectacled -- is writing in a ledger on his desk. Rows and rows of days and weeks, laconic remarks in a single column: *patrol*, *case*, *vacation*, *injured*...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It's a matter of days, not weeks.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a matter of days, not weeks."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Is that all?" She puts down the ph..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is that all?" She puts down the photo.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant consults his noteboo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant consults his notebook, his eyebrows knitted in concentration...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ma'am, with all due respect -- I'v..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ma'am, with all due respect -- I've been around Martinaise and there's a giant hulk of a man in ill-fitting clothes at the harbour gates. Mr. 'Right to Work.' His heart *really* isn't in it."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Meaning they're used to operating..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Meaning they're used to operating in war zones."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Sadly -- no. Before this happened..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sadly -- no. Before this happened I had little interest in them. Now that I do -- I don't have the resources." She thinks.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Do not gloat, officer. These are g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do not gloat, officer. These are grave matters."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Krenel -- an Oranjese military com..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Krenel -- an Oranjese military company. As far as I know three arrived in Martinaise. They report to me sporadically, but they do not answer to me. To be frank, our relationship is deteriorating."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It was the *Union* who strung him..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was the *Union* who strung him from that tree." A wave crashes against the side of her boat. "My hope is that you provide a single, concrete suspect before Krenel indiscriminately pick theirs. Simply put..." She grabs hold of the mainsail:
fields.Alternate1: "It was the *Union* who strung him from that tree." A wave crashes against the side of her boat. "My hope is that you provide a single, concrete suspect before Krenel indiscriminately pick theirs. Simply put..." She leans against the wooden planks:

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "The muzzle-loaders need to be reloa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The muzzle-loaders need to be reloaded after every one or two shots -- the automatics every one or two *minutes*.

fields.Title: You: ""I have to say -- this is *not* dis..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have to say -- this is *not* disco."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, I'll steer clear for the mom..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, I'll steer clear for the moment."
fields.Alternate1: "Okay, we'll steer clear for the moment."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""That's wise," she nods. "Our goal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's wise," she nods. "Our goal is to *avert* catastrophe. Besides," she sighs, "You're likely to encounter them sooner or later."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The sailor's soul would use it to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The sailor's soul would use it to fly back home if they should die abroad. This is a sort of... contraption. To be reeled back in by. The *silver cord*, they would call it."

fields.Title: You: ""This one has flown quite far by no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This one has flown quite far by now."

fields.Title: Empathy: "It could go this or the other way...."
fields.Dialogue Text: It could go this or the other way. Maybe if you're tactful, it could be beneficial?

fields.Title: You: ""Okay. Anything else you can tell m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. Anything else you can tell me?"
fields.Alternate1: "Okay. Anything else you got on them?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She's silent."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's silent.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's alright, ma'am. Anything el..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's alright, ma'am. Anything else -- nationality? What would you say was his age?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Indeed. This matches the dental re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Indeed. This matches the dental reconstruction we saw on the body," he says to you, then turns back to Joyce. "What else? Nationality? Accent?"
fields.Alternate1: "This matches the dental reconstruction we saw on the body; and Klaasje also mentioned it I believe..." he says to you, then turns back to Joyce. "What else? Nationality? Accent?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""He was Occidental I think. Light b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He was Occidental I think. Light brown hair, a mix accent. Oranjese, or Messinian maybe? His injury gave him an accent all his own..."

fields.Title: You: ""What else? Nationality? Accent?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What else? Nationality? Accent?"

fields.Title: Drama: "She's being truthful. She is pressi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's being truthful. She is pressing them as hard as she can.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She sips from her thermos. She does..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She sips from her thermos. She does not look away from you.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I have an indirect role to play, I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have an indirect role to play, I'm sad to say. My employer experienced a *momentary lapse of faith* in me. In that moment they elected to deploy a private military contractor. As an *insurance* measure. They called it my 'security detail'."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""They were dispatched after I relay..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They were dispatched after I relayed the Union's initial offer."

fields.Title: You: ""What then?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What then?"

fields.Title: You: ""What travels did the dead man make..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What travels did the dead man make?

fields.Title: You: ""That's all for the tattoos. Thank..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's all for the tattoos. Thank you for your help."

fields.Title: You: ""This one is going nowhere but the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This one is going nowhere but the morgue."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""That makes sense to me. We have no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That makes sense to me. We have no more use for a Map of the Waterways. Just like we don't need sailors the way we used to. This is what the custom would morph into on the Occident -- mercenary tattoos."

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Challenge accepted! I say we do it."
fields.Dialogue Text: Challenge accepted! I say we do it.

fields.Title: You: ""His name was...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "His name was..."

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "The muzzle-loaders need to be reloa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The muzzle-loaders need to be reloaded after every one, two -- or in your case three -- shots, the automatics every one or two *minutes*.

fields.Title: You: ""A momentary lapse of faith?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "A momentary lapse of faith?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So what happened?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So what happened?"

fields.Title: You: ""Where are the remaining two mercs..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where are the remaining two mercs now?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""They've gone to ground, as it were..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They've gone to ground, as it were. I don't recommend seeking them out." She puts her foot on the guardwire, for balance. "For one -- they're almost certainly armed to the teeth."
fields.Alternate1: "They've gone to ground, as it were. I don't recommend seeking them out." She raises a cautionary finger. "For one -- they're likely to be armed to the teeth..."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Should have cornered her. Maybe it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Should have cornered her. Maybe it would have yielded something...

fields.Title: You: ""Who did the passing on then?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who did the passing on then?"

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, I'll steer clear for the mom..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, I'll steer clear for the moment."
fields.Alternate1: "Okay, we'll steer clear for the moment."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I think I know where you found it,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think I know where you found it, Officer Du Bois -- in that motor carriage protruding from the ice over there."

fields.Title: You: ""No. It was a in a good, normal pla..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. It was a in a good, normal place."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""They wear ceramic armour, have sem..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They wear ceramic armour, have semi-automatic weapons and years of combat experience. They also have Trauma-and-Stressor Disorder and no idea how to conduct themselves in an urban civilian environment."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The Seraise Giant Hornet, the world..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The Seraise Giant Hornet, the world's second largest insect, can kill forty honey bees a minute while a group of 30 can decimate an entire hive of 20,000 bees in less than four hours.

fields.Title: Half Light: "Maybe a good bloodletting is just w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe a good bloodletting is just what Martinaise needs?

fields.Title: You: ""Isn't this a pretty... bleak scena..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Isn't this a pretty... bleak scenario you're describing?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I am sorry to have been the bearer..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am sorry to have been the bearer of bad news. If there is anything else I can help you with, please ask."

fields.Title: Authority: "Vigilantes? You're a professional o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Vigilantes? You're a professional officer of the only *legitimate* authority in Revachol.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Close," she nods. "Port cities. Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Close," she nods. "Port cities. This is an Oranjese Map of the Waterways -- a sailor's tattoo worn by wayfarers of the Dolorian century, over 300 years ago. The sailors would mark their bodies to map their travels."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We will be careful, ma'am.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "We will be careful, ma'am."

fields.Title: Logic: "One must be at the harbour gates, c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: One must be at the harbour gates, causing trouble. Directing strikebreakers perhaps? You can hear the sounds of the ruckus coming from there all the time.

fields.Title: You: ""I have no idea what you're talking..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have no idea what you're talking about."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What else? Nationality? Accent?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What else? Nationality? Accent?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""In a way it was humanizing. He had..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "In a way it was humanizing. He had to learn to speak *through* it -- through the injury." She nods. "That's all I know, I guess. I only met him once."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Then we're on the same page -- as..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then we're on the same page -- as grim as it may be."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm glad we reached an agreement w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm glad we reached an agreement without turning the RCM into your personal investigative unit."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Absolutely not. These mercenaries..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Absolutely not. These mercenaries are muscle, pure and simple. They are meant to intimidate the Union into surrendering."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What is the nature of this so-call..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is the nature of this so-called investigation?"

fields.Title: You: "Leave it be."
fields.Dialogue Text: Leave it be.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Odd... we haven't heard any report..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Odd... we haven't heard any reports about an *assault* in connection with the lynching. Where did it take place? And when?"

fields.Title: You: ""That's less than reassuring.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's less than reassuring."

fields.Title: You: ""I had another question for you.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I had another question for you."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""That may be so." She is poised and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That may be so." She is poised and unperturbed. "I still hope you heed my advice -- there's no need to kick the hornet's nest."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Paramilitary death squad is a bit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Paramilitary death squad is a bit rich." She remains calm: "But yes -- were it up to me I would have at least *vetted* them more thoroughly."

fields.Title: You: ""Could you contact the company? Tel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Could you contact the company? Tell them to call them off."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Either way, he's alleged to have s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Either way, he's alleged to have sexually assaulted a woman. Sometime later a group of dockworkers got their hands on him..."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "You'll meet her soon enough, you fe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You'll meet her soon enough, you feel.

fields.Title: Half Light: "It'll be all of them. The decision..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It'll be all of them. The decision is already made.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""You found it the motor carriage yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You found it the motor carriage you drove into the sea."

fields.Title: You: ""How are the lynching and the strik..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How are the lynching and the strike connected?"
fields.Alternate1: "Tell me again -- how are the lynching and the strike connected?"
fields.Alternate2: "I've already heard about a connection between the lynching and strike, but I need your testimony."
fields.Alternate3: "Tell me again about the connection between the lynching and the strike."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It doesn't matter. What matters is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It doesn't matter. What matters is -- you found it. And not a moment too soon."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""One single, concrete suspect deliv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "One single, concrete suspect delivered into Civil Court -- and I *may* be able to defuse this situation."

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "She wears fingerless gloves, her fi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She wears fingerless gloves, her fingernails are cut short and fractured. Like those of a working woman.

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Port cities. On the oceans. This i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Port cities. On the oceans. This is an Oranjese Map of the Waterways -- a sailor's tattoo worn by wayfarers of the Dolorian century -- as early as 300 years ago. The sailors would mark their bodies to map their travels."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I would say he's near the Arcade I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I would say he's near the Arcade Islands by now, ready to exit the Insulindian and enter the pale. If I've read his home address correctly." She smiles.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "The Old Old World passing by and th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The Old Old World passing by and the New New World already here.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""*Krenel* -- an Oranjese military c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Krenel* -- an Oranjese military company. As far as I know three arrived in Martinaise. They report to me sporadically, but they do not answer to me. To be frank, our relationship is deteriorating."

fields.Title: You: ""You're right...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right..."

fields.Title: You: "Where *are* these mercenaries?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Where *are* these mercenaries?
fields.variable8: CheckEquipped("shirt_t500")  and  (CheckEquipped("gloves_t500")  or  CheckEquipped("shoes_t500"))  and  (CheckEquipped("jacket_rcm") == false  or  CheckEquipped("jacket_patrol_cloak") == false)

fields.Title: Logic: "This is so embarrassing. You have n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is so embarrassing. You have no idea. There's something *wrong* with your brain. Luckily the lieutenant still has his.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Your concern may be appearances. O..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Your concern may be appearances. Ours is keeping the peace."

fields.Title: Empathy: "You don't know how you know -- it's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You don't know how you know -- it's not written on her face, nor in her voice -- but she had sympathy for this man.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: ""Last Sunday night, at the Whirling..."]
You: ""And who was this woman?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "And who was this woman?"
fields.Alternate1: (Don't mention it.) "And who was this woman?"

fields.Title: You: ""Do you need a security detail?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you need a security detail?"

fields.Title: You: ""Who are they?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who are they?"

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Investigation upon investigation, h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Investigation upon investigation, here in Martinaise, racing toward some dark deadline.

fields.Title: You: ""See, this is the Great Bloodlettin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "See, this is the Great Bloodletting I've been telling everyone about."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""All we can do is keep the rest fro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "All we can do is keep the rest from following suit. One single, concrete suspect delivered into Civil Court -- and I *may* be able to defuse this situation."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She reaches for the photo; takes it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She reaches for the photo; takes it, then holds it in her hand...
fields.Alternate1: "Of course -- excuse my hesitation before." She reaches over the guardwire and takes the photo; holds it in her hand...

fields.Title: You: ""Places? Like blooms in a pattern?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Places? Like blooms in a pattern?"
fields.Alternate1: "Like blooms in a pattern?"

fields.Title: You: ""Who could tell me more?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who could tell me more?"

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["TASK.talk_merc_tattoo"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.talk_merc_tattoo_cancelled"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.talk_merc_tattoo_done"] == false

fields.Title: You: ""I've spoken to him. For now the so..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've spoken to him. For now the soul is fastened inside his corpse."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The times have changed.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The times have changed."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Whatever I can help you with. We n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Whatever I can help you with. We need to contain the situation."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""That *would* afford a good vantage..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That *would* afford a good vantage point," she says. "In any case, it's practically inaccessible."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "It's the *expression* she objects t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's the *expression* she objects to?

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "She's picked a strange hill to die..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's picked a strange hill to die on. Strike!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What is the purpose of this, detec..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is the purpose of this, detective?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Last Sunday night, at the Whirling..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Last Sunday night, at the Whirling-in-Rags -- the hostel by the gates. Supposedly the colonel was drunk, maybe on narcotics too."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: ""He was forty. Or fifty. It's hard..."]
Pain Threshold: "Must be hard to force your face to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Must be hard to force your face to move in a new fashion. If you continue like this, you'll have an aneurysm. Then you'll have to, too.

fields.Title: You: ""What was that about a... *blood ba..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What was that about a... *blood bath*?"
fields.Alternate1: "Uh, did you say *blood bath*?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [let the blood let hub]
Joyce Messier: ""It doesn't have to be like this."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It doesn't have to be like this." She looks at you, eyes damp from the wind.
fields.Alternate1: "It doesn't have to be like this." She looks at you, eyes damp from the wind. "Lieutenant Double-Yefreitor Du Bois..."
fields.Alternate2: "It doesn't have to be like this." She looks at you, eyes damp from the wind. "Nameless, badge-less officer of the Citizens Militia..."

fields.Title: You: ""Vigilantes? The RCM gets its autho..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Vigilantes? The RCM gets its authority from the Coalition. Where does theirs come from?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Somehow I doubt that lecturing the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Somehow I doubt that lecturing them on the legitimate use of force will persuade them to stand down."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I can't. But that's how you read t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can't. But that's how you read this story. The points themselves don't have letters, numbers, anything. Their size, location on the body and distance from each other tells you what they represent."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "...for about half a minute -- in si..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...for about half a minute -- in silence.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Then he made his way to the Preto..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then he made his way to the Preto Grande, through what I think must be Staadskanaal -- an artificial channel through the Occident. From the Preto he sailed to the Insulindic ocean. First the Semenese islands, then this..." She points to his heart.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "*IN MARTINAISE, LOOKING INTO KRENEL..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *IN MARTINAISE, LOOKING INTO KRENEL*, he writes in one. Then the man puts down his pen and rubs his temples with both hands. Outside there is a siren, distant gunshots on the streets of the Jamrock Quarter.

fields.Title: You: ""You're right. Not a good idea." (L..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right. Not a good idea." (Leave it off the schedule.)

fields.Title: You: ""It's not the first I've heard of t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not the first I've heard of this. Where did this assault take place? And when?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Good. Then you've made progress. I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good. Then you've made progress. It's imperative that you move fast. The *tribunal* will not be patient."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Or he *didn't*." She tilts her hea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Or he *didn't*." She tilts her head. "This is information passed on to me from some teenagers loitering around the canal. I cannot testify by it. "

fields.Title: You: ""Tell me about the others first.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Tell me about the others first."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She closes her eyes, trying to pict..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She closes her eyes, trying to picture the man's face... then shakes her head...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The remaining contractors. Their *..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The remaining contractors. Their *tribunal*. It's what they believe."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""That's a good question, officer. I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's a good question, officer. I don't have the slightest idea. As I said, it's a rumour -- about a rumour. In any case, it's what the colonel's remaining... colleagues... believe."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Who are they, exactly?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who are they, exactly?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It's a smokescreen. In secret, the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a smokescreen. In secret, they are conducting an independent military tribunal into the lynching. Once this *investigation* is concluded, executions will follow."

fields.Title: You: ""For now?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "For now?"

fields.Title: Logic: "The Union has over two thousand men..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The Union has over two thousand men.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She is silent for a moment, then co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She is silent for a moment, then concludes: "As I said -- a blood bath."

fields.Title: You: ""I can't see it happen. Too many th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can't see it happen. Too many things would have to go wrong first."

fields.Title: You: ""See, Kim. This is that Great Blood..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "See, Kim. This is that Great Bloodletting I've been telling you about."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""If you still have access to the IC..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you still have access to the ICP's database, you could run a better background check than I ever could. It may take some time, though..." She thinks.

fields.Title: You: ""You said you can't read it -- seem..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You said you can't read it -- seems like you can."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""His platoon members? The other con..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "His platoon members? The other contractors -- though I do *not* suggest you go and show them that picture. This man was their friend and comrade."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Not much. Their public resume is r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not much. Their public resume is relatively good -- as far as private military contractors go. I believe they were once called... Downwell."

fields.Title: You: ""Never mind. Forget it.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Never mind. Forget it."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Ah yes, your condition. The Intern..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah yes, your condition. The International Collaboration Police maintains a database for these sorts of things. Perhaps you should consult it. It was just a suggestion."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Perhaps the arrangement no longer..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Perhaps the arrangement no longer stands... excuse me, it's not my place to pry. If it does you should take advantage of it. Just a suggestion."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I have. And they *will*. However,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have. And they *will*. However, these orders take time to reach what is basically a rogue unit out in the field, here. Until they do -- it's all on us."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: ""That's wise," she nods. "Our goal..."]
Logic: "You wouldn't even know where to sta..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You wouldn't even know where to start.

fields.Title: You: ""Don't you want to know where I fou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't you want to know where I found my badge?" (Put your badge away.)

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["XP.joyce_showed_your_badge"] == true  and  Variable["pier.joyce_looking_for_badge_for_lynch"] == true  and  CheckItem("badge")

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""No, no, no -- we *need* to discuss..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, no, no -- we *need* to discuss this *now*. There isn't time to waste. Blood bath, remember?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Whether to execute one, some, or a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Whether to execute one, some, or all of the Union militants."

fields.Title: You: ""You've made a mess here.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You've made a mess here."

fields.Title: You: ""This *colonel*, the one who was ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This *colonel*, the one who was hanged -- did you know him?"

fields.Title: You: ""How much time do we have?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How much time do we have?"

fields.Title: You: ""I still need to know where they ar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I still need to know where they are."
fields.Alternate1: "We still need to know where they are."

fields.Title: You: ""I'll confront them directly.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'll confront them directly."
fields.Alternate1: "We'll confront them *directly*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It was taken with a Trigat, not lo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was taken with a Trigat, not long ago. This is the man's upper body. There were no more markings on his hands or legs."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "Her mouth is relaxed, the accordion..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Her mouth is relaxed, the accordion lines near her mouth vanish. The pearls of her eyes move slowly on the photo's surface.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Revachol," she says. "Those are th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Revachol," she says. "Those are the two constants: Vredefort on the shoulder and Revachol in the heart. They started the tradition of these maps right after the discovery of Insulinde, at the dawn of the Interisolary Age."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Until the executions start? Truthf..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Until the executions start? Truthfully -- I don't know. It depends on their progress identifying the members of the lynch mob. And their impatience."

fields.Title: You: ""Places? Like vias on a microcircui..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Places? Like vias on a microcircuit?"
fields.Alternate1: "Like vias on a microcircuit?"

fields.Title: You: ""Maybe it's a record of his militar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe it's a record of his military career?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""In my line of work it pays to do y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "In my line of work it pays to do your research. I was prepared to deal with the RCM. I did *not* think I would be dealing with a group like *Krenel*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant jots something down..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant jots something down in his notebook, muttering to himself: "Had him down as Mondial... should change it to Occidental."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Occidental... that fits the statem..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Occidental... that fits the statement of another witness," the lieutenant says, pleased.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Your response does not inspire grea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your response does not inspire great faith in the RCM.

fields.Title: Authority: "They would have to. To project stre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: They would have to. To project strength and power.

fields.Title: You: ""I think the confrontation is inevi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think the confrontation is inevitable."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It will not be a pretty sight.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It will not be a pretty sight."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""All we can do is keep the little t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "All we can do is keep the little that has not from following suit. One single, concrete suspect delivered into Civil Court -- and I *may* be able to defuse this situation."

fields.Title: Volition: "She cannot let you leave without ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She cannot let you leave without having her say.

fields.Title: You: ""You said the deceased assaulted a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You said the deceased assaulted a woman?"

fields.Title: You: ""What? You mean you don't know what..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What? You mean you don't know what's going on?"

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Vredefort? Vredefort has a military..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Vredefort? Vredefort has a military academy. The Semenese islands saw a recent conflict. In Revachol he was executed.

fields.Title: You: ""What is the use of this map?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is the use of this map?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Do what you have to do, detective...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do what you have to do, detective. I don't think deciphering that tattoo should come before public security. But if you should wade into the mob to find out -- I couldn't stop you."
fields.Alternate1: "Do what you have to do, detective Du Bois. *I* don't think deciphering that tattoo should come before public security. But if you should wade into the mob to find out -- I couldn't stop you."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I am relieved you think so. I don'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am relieved you think so. I don't think deciphering that tattoo should come before public security."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course it bothers me, lieutenan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course it bothers me, lieutenant, but my hands are tied. How would my employer react if it appeared I were intervening on behalf of the *Union*?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I wouldn't go as far as to use tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I wouldn't go as far as to use that term detective."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""That the man was killed because he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That the man was killed because he assaulted a local woman. I've asked around a bit -- this seems to be the accepted story around Martinaise."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Five days. Not more. Maybe sooner."
fields.Dialogue Text: Five days. Not more. Maybe sooner.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""'Every worker a member of the boar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "'Every worker a member of the board'. I tried to convince my employer it was simply a piece of rhetoric and not a serious demand. But the... *stridency* of it seems to have spooked them."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The Dbardeurs have over two thous..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The Dbardeurs have over two thousand men. It will be a thousand to one."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""All we can do is keep that which h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "All we can do is keep that which has not from following suit. One single, concrete suspect delivered into Civil Court -- and I *may* be able to defuse this situation."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I am sorry to confirm it.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am sorry to confirm it."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You said you can't read it.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You said you can't read it."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""They don't report their progress t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They don't report their progress to you?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Not on this matter. I'm afraid the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not on this matter. I'm afraid they consider this a personal initiative." There is a brief silence. Seagulls squawk over the bay...

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Where is he now?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Where is he now?

fields.Title: You: ""My bad, I thought you said *mud* b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My bad, I thought you said *mud* bath..."

fields.Title: You: ""What did these teenagers by the ca..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What did these teenagers by the canal say?"

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Like a crossword puzzle solver. Or..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Like a crossword puzzle solver. Or a master at the guessing game Peng.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Nothing is inaccessible."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nothing is inaccessible.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It's not good, no," a wave crashes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not good, no," a wave crashes against the side of her boat. "My only hope is that you provide a single, concrete suspect before the mercenaries indiscriminately pick theirs. Simply put..." She grabs hold of the mainsail:
fields.Alternate1: "My only hope is that yours provides a single, concrete suspect -- before they indiscriminately pick theirs. Simply put..." She leans against the wooden planks:

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Not a terribly good actor that one..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not a terribly good actor that one. Still..."

fields.Title: You: ""Does this mean I don't have to loo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Does this mean I don't have to look into that drug stuff?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Nothing. Mr. Claire refuses to let..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing. Mr. Claire refuses to let me into the harbour. I have not been able to discuss this matter with anyone there. The remaining two Krenel contractors carry out their orders -- for now."

fields.Title: You: "Shudder."
fields.Dialogue Text: Shudder.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Clean, yes. Nothing will grow here..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Clean, yes. Nothing will grow here for twenty years. Krenel will send in gunships and the Coalition Government will follow suit."

fields.Title: You: ""I need the information." (Mark it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I need the information." (Mark it down: ask mercs about tattoos.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Did you miss the part about *ceram..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did you miss the part about *ceramic armour* and *automatic weapons*, detective?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And the other must be in one of th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And the other must be in one of the four-story buildings overlooking the roundabout. He or she was reporting back to you while we were canvassing the lorry drivers."
fields.Alternate1: "And the other one, de Paule, must be in one of the four-story buildings overlooking the roundabout. She was reporting back to you while we were canvassing the lorry drivers."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Heavens no, I'm not an undercover..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Heavens no, I'm not an undercover agent. There's a shortwave at the ship's wheel," she nods toward the sloop's cabin.
